subject: Nutrition
title: Vitamin D The Sunshine Vitamin
description: One-minute skill: Vitamin D The Sunshine Vitamin.

hook.text: Your skin manufactures vitamin D when ultraviolet light hits it. No food requiredâ€”just sunshine.

buildup.text: Vitamin D helps your gut absorb calcium. Without it, bones soften no matter how much calcium you eat.

discovery.text: About one billion people worldwide are vitamin D deficient, mostly because modern life happens indoors.

twist.text: People with darker skin need up to six times more sun exposure to produce the same amount of vitamin D.

climax.text: Vitamin D is now linked to immunity, mood regulation, and cancer preventionâ€”far beyond just bones.

punchline.text: The vitamin your body makes for free is one most people lack.

quiz.question: How many people are vitamin D deficient worldwide?
